definition[0]: the respect and admiration that someone or something gets because of their success or important position in society
example[0]: The king wanted to enhance his prestige through war.
example[1]: This little-known British firm has now gained considerable prestige.
example[2]: the personal prestige attached to owning a large property
example[3]: the prestige of having your work shown at a top London gallery
definition[1]: a prestige project, product etc is one of high quality that people respect you for having or being involved in
definition[2]: the respect and importance a person, organization, profession, or product has because of their success and high quality
example[6]: The bank lost both money and prestige as a result of the transaction.
example[7]: Revlon launched a comprehensive marketing program for its prestige brands.
